titles: The form of a certificate to be used by Justices of Peace and others, through England and Wales in the case of Popish recusants refusing to take the oath of abjuration, and neglecting to appear before the justices to take the said oath.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Catholics --  England --  Legal status, laws, etc --  Early works to 1800.
